ComicInfo.Title: Rrrregresamos..; Crimen Final; Go! Go! Go!; Crimen Seis; Dogs Follow Dogs; Crimen Cinco; Familylimaf; Crimen Cuatro; Crimen Tres; Crestfallen Angel; Pack Mules; Crimen Dos; Urchins; Tarzana Adventures; Crimen Uno; Wrench World; Fuck Summer; Shoes; Crime Raiders International Mobsters and Executioners; Tonta
ComicInfo.Summary:
Tonta gets spooked at a punk show featuring singer Eric Lopez's band Ooot, hearing his refrain "black widow black widow." She heads to the woods and has a flashback to her childhood.
Violet wallows in her courtroom defeat after her mother is declared not guilty on all counts.
Tonta helps win the swim meet for her school's team. Afterwards, she and Gomez go to the woods in order to avoid the media circus from her mother's trial.
Vivian and Mel talk about the upcoming trial.
Tonta finally finds out what Violet thinks their mother did. Jolena, out on bail, calls to have Muñeca and Tonta back home. When the two get back, Jolena announces they're going out of state, causing first Muñeca to run away and then the distraught Tonta.
Tonta finally learns that Ish is her half brother, causing her much dismay.
Angel lets Tonta and Gomez know that she saw them at her lucha libre match.
The siblings receive word that Al Castor passed away.
The siblings start to file charges against their mother.
The awkward Angel is invited to a music club but she turns it down.
Tonta, Gomez and Gretchen attend a lucha libre match incognito to see Angel play.
Violet tries to convince Ish to file charges against their mother for murder.
Muñeca wants to sleep in Tonta's room for the night.
Tonta and Gomez check out Angel's house in Tarzana, California.
Violet gets Ish to come to the Cobia Club in order talk about an important matter.
Tonta comes back home only to see police in front of her house. Her step-dad Al Castor has been shot.
Tonta listens to Eric Lopez's punk band Ooot practice, almost wrecks Moses's skateboard, meets with coach Angel Rivera and then hangs out with Gretchen "The Gorgon" in the forest.
Tonta's mom orders her to retrieve the school uniform she discarded in the forest. She then meets up with The Gorgon.
A story told entirely from Ray's point of view as he pays Doyle a visit and recalls their school days.
While at the Cobia Club, Mel, the owner tells Vivian he'll call her. Back at home, Vivian receives multiple phone calls from someone, presumably Mel, who hangs up when she picks up the phone. While Vivian's out, a visiting Tonta tries out her lingerie and plays with a gun that was in the dresser. The gun goes off accidentally, leaving a small hole in the wall. Borneo, Sugar Bear and Tito show up and distract Tonta while Sugar Bear retrieves the gun. Back at the Cobia Club later on, Tonta witnesses a failed assassination attempt on Spropp by Borneo with the same gun that was in Viv's dresser.
Tonta hangs out with her outcast friend The Gorgon. Afterwards, she meets her friends outside a punk show. She then goes home to sneak some liquor to take back with her to the show. She passes out from drinking after meeting Eric Lopez, her favorite punk singer and fails to remember what happened after that.
